# designjobs — Healthcare UX Jobs

> Healthcare UX jobs, curated by the community. Open source and free forever.

## About

health.designjobs.cv is the healthcare vertical of designjobs, a community-curated job board for design roles. This vertical focuses exclusively on UX, product design, and design research roles at healthcare and health-tech companies.

## Current Stats

- 24 verified job listings
- 19 companies represented
- Levels: Mid, Senior, Staff, Lead, Director
- Location types: Remote, Hybrid, Onsite
- Updated 3x/week (Monday, Wednesday, Friday)

## Pages

- / — Homepage with featured jobs and value proposition
- /jobs — All job listings with search, location filter, and level/type filters
- /submit — Submit a new job listing for community review
- /report — Report broken links, wrong info, or site bugs
- /rss.xml — RSS feed of all job listings
- /sitemap.xml — XML sitemap

## How It Works

1. Jobs are sourced from company career pages via community submissions and automated discovery
2. Every job URL is verified via automated browser validation before publishing
3. Listings are checked for accuracy 3x/week; dead links are automatically removed
4. Anyone can submit a job or report an issue

## Job Data Format

Each job includes: title, company, company URL, seniority level, location type (Remote/Hybrid/Onsite), location, tags (e.g. telehealth, mental health, B2C), direct application URL, and posted date.
